DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare analgesic efficacy 5 mg oxymorphone IR placebo patient mild moderate pain follow outpatient knee arthroscopy .
DOC.criteria: Males female , 18 year age old , complete outpatient knee arthroscopy Have initial pain intensity score 30mm 70mm 100mm Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) categorical pain rating scale none , mild , moderate , severe , Have inform nature study provide write informed consent Have positive pregnancy test Have receive following medication within 24 hour prior dosing : COX2 inhibitor , Minor Tranquilizers , Muscle relaxant , Antihistamines Longacting oral parenteral analgesic prohibit least 12 hour prior receive study medication . Have receive following medication within 48 hour prior dosing : Chronic use analgesic ( opioid nonopioid include aspirin [ > 325 mg/day ] , acetaminophen , NSAIDs ) Have receive MAOI drug within 2 week prior dose Not stabilize follow medication least 4 week prior dose : Tricyclic antidepressant drug , Serotonin reuptake inhibitor , Amphetamines use ADHD
